Description: Fragment of round handle of an Apulian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine pink-buff; some mica. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Pencil '706'? Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 80 19. Name Visellius.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1275)
